```css
// Property: calendarAuthorization
// Description: Returns an authorization constant indicating if the application has access to the events in the EventKit.
// Component(s): Ti.Calendar
'.calendar-authorization-authorized': { calendarAuthorization: Ti.Calendar.AUTHORIZATION_AUTHORIZED }
'.calendar-authorization-denied': { calendarAuthorization: Ti.Calendar.AUTHORIZATION_DENIED }
'.calendar-authorization-restricted': { calendarAuthorization: Ti.Calendar.AUTHORIZATION_RESTRICTED }
'.calendar-authorization-unknown': { calendarAuthorization: Ti.Calendar.AUTHORIZATION_UNKNOWN }
```
